about_the_game:
Estimated demo time: 30 minutes

Synopsis: In a military base, experiments with a rare material are being conducted for technological and weaponry purposes. However, anomalies begin to occur, with objects from different times appearing and disappearing. The lead scientist decides to use these anomalies to his advantage, attempting to revive his wife and daughter, who tragically died in an accident. But things go horribly wrong, and massive, prehistoric creatures start to appear within the base, lurking in the fog.

You will experience the first use of the time machine and the search for the last capsule needed to reactivate it, while navigating an unfamiliar environment, hunted by creatures lurking in the shadows.

content_descriptors.notes: When dinosaurs or other enemies manage to reach the player, some animations of blood or torn limbs can be too intense for some users.

name: Tempus Triad DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4430K CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 1060 6gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600, 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 8gb
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In Tempus Triad, dive into an ancient first-person horror scenario where a scientist is thrust into an era where huge predators dominate the land.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
